channel.title: War Design on Writing by Harper Reed
channel.description: Recent content in War Design on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: I love the internet
item.description: I love finding stuff that pushes the limits. It is always by sheer luck that it happens as well. check out this, this, this, and some other site I liked but immediatly forgot…whoops.. hopefully I will be able to hang out with my new friends tonight..
